backups.download_file_format:

Keep these backup codes somewhere safe but accessible.

* You can only use each backup code once.

backups.modal_message: Keep these recovery codes in a safe place. If you lose your two factor enabled device, these one-time use codes can be used in the listed order to log in to your account.

setup_modal.enter_code_disable: Enter the code to disable Two Factor.
setup_modal.scan_qr: Scan this QR code with your two factor authentication device to set up your account.
setup_modal.title: Two Factor
